title: @Riot, Have you considered chromas for higher tier skins?
body: Now that Chromas have been released on live servers, what are your thoughts on making chromas that change certain parts of the skin to  a slightly greater degree? In this example I use the upcoming skin Star Guardian Lux. A few people have suggested to change the hair style, but some are opposed to it as the hair style used right now gives the skin a reference to Madoka Magica.

replies.body: The idea of chromas is to 'recolor' an existing skin. The model would stay the same, which means that things such as hair wouldn't change. Even so, I'd love to see some Star Guardian Lux chromas. *u*

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=RdAIRwt4,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-05-01T23:37:28.624+0000)
>
> The idea of chromas is to 'recolor' an existing skin. The model would stay the same, which means that things such as hair wouldn't change. Even so, I'd love to see some Star Guardian Lux chromas. *u*

Yeah, I thought that was the case, just needed confirmation ;-;

Thank you for clearing that up, though!

May I make the suggestion for Super Galaxy Rumble recolors? Specifically in 'power rangers' shades (Red, Blue, Pink, Green, etc).

Pls. Me and my friends have been wanting to have the 'Super Galaxy Rangers' team for One for All.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=RdAIRwt4,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-05-01T23:37:28.624+0000)
>
> The idea of chromas is to 'recolor' an existing skin. The model would stay the same, which means that things such as hair wouldn't change.

That's just an alpha channel bruh.
Not a bad idea, in your examples though you just used different shades of pink/purple. I think it would more be like complete recolor of the costume. (and maybe hair in this instance)

> [{quoted}](name=Hatless Casual,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=RdAIRwt4,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-05-02T10:26:48.931+0000)
>
> Not a bad idea, in your examples though you just used different shades of pink/purple. I think it would more be like complete recolor of the costume. (and maybe hair in this instance)

Yeah, the ones in the middle are just different shades of pink. I took this example from a[ reddit post](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/34cbaj/riot_what_if_star_guardian_lux_looked_like_this/), though. Probably should have included that in the initial post.

Some champions I like only have one skin I'd ever mess with when I play them, chroma'd or not. It'd be really cool to see skins like Blackfrost anivia or Pulsefire ezreal be subject to these chromas. If not...meh, chromas prolly aren't for me. I don't see the point of falling for "this chroma requires this skin, which requires this champion." dollar signs everywhere.

Hmm, I think thats the point of chromas
Chroma-purity or intensity of color.
Yep. Seems likely, a rioter responded to an ask if they would change Garen's hair color like the original chroma for him did and they said its a possibility.
